A4.text: Bordeaux (bor-DOH; French: [bɔrdo] ; Gascon Occitan: Bordèu [buɾˈðɛw]; Basque: Bordele) is a city on the river Garonne in the Gironde department, southwestern France.

A6.text: The Dordogne flows into the Gironde, its common estuary with the Garonne, at the Bec d'Ambès, north of the city of Bordeaux.
